api_list.api_description: Returns a random advice slip as a slip object.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name for JSONP.

api_list.api_description: Fetches a random Kanye West quote.

query: I'm looking for some inspiration. Could you give me a piece of random advice and a quote from Kanye West?

api_list.api_description: Returns a specific advice slip by slip_id.

required_parameters.name: slip_id
required_parameters.description: The unique ID of the advice slip.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name for JSONP.

api_list.api_description: Fetches a random Kanye West quote.

query: Can you fetch advice number 2 from the advice slip API and give me a Kanye West quote?

api_list.api_description: Search for advice slips containing the given query term.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query for advice slips.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name for JSONP.

api_list.api_description: Fetches a random Kanye West quote.

query: I am working on improving my life. Can you search for any advice on 'motivation' and provide me with a Kanye West quote?
